Row.Text: You win this victory when first to build 20 Sanctuaries.

The people of the New World have preserved its pristine beauty and natural perfection.[NEWLINE]Will you also honour that tradition or plunder the New World for its resources?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The player who completes 20 Sanctuaries before time expires (125 turns) will triumph over its rivals.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]SPECIAL RULES:[NEWLINE]Domination, Culture, Religious and Science victories are disabled.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]You may win a score victory with special VP:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]100VP for each National Park[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]10VP for every tile of untouched natural environment (forest, marsh and rain forest) in your empire.
